lead_paragraph: Davide Rebellin of Italy won the Paris-Nice race by three seconds in the closest finish in the event. Rebellin was followed in the final standings by Rinaldo Nocentini of Italy. Yaroslav Popovych of Ukraine was third, 48 seconds behind. Rebellin was the runner-up in 2007.
